input_text:
Job Title: Electrical Engineer I (Junior level)

Location: Naperville, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Want to learn more about this role and Jobot? Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Job details

Join our team as a Junior Electrical Engineer at one of the leading AEC companies in IL - great opportunity to take your career to the next level!

This Jobot Job is hosted by Liz Valdez

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button and sending us your resume.

Salary $70,000 - $85,000 per year

A Bit About Us

We are a multi-disciplined engineering firm with a long-standing track record of success. Our roots are in providing consulting engineering services to architectural and industrial clients. We are a trusted partner in each step of the design process in industries that include structural, civil, process industrial, environmental, health & safety, oil & gas, mechanical, and electrical.



Why join us?


If you're looking to launch your career or take it to the next level, and want more details, apply now!

What We Offer

Competitive base salary and overall compensation package

Full benefits Medical, Dental, Vision

Generous PTO, vacation, sick, and holidays

Life Insurance coverage

401 (K) with generous company match

Job Details

Job Details

We are seeking a passionate and dedicated Junior Electrical Engineer to join our dynamic team. This is an excellent opportunity to apply your skills and knowledge in a practical, hands-on environment. You will be involved in a wide range of exciting projects, from designing and planning to testing and implementing electrical systems. Our ideal candidate has a strong understanding of electrical engineering principles, a keen eye for detail, and a passion for continuous learning in this ever-evolving industry.

Responsibilities

As an Electrical Engineer I (Junior level), you will be responsible for

 Assist in designing electrical systems and circuits, under the supervision of a Senior Electrical Engineer. Assisting in the planning and executing detailed electrical engineering designs and calculations. Use AutoCAD and Revit to create, modify, and manage electrical design plans and projects. Collaborate with the engineering team to solve complex electrical problems, ensuring solutions are implemented correctly. Ensure all electrical designs and installations conform to industry quality standards and safety regulations. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure project requirements are met and completed on time. Provide technical support and guidance to other team members, promoting a learning culture within the team Keeping up-to-date with the latest technologies and industry trends to ensure our projects are at the forefront of innovation.

Qualifications

To be considered for the Electrical Engineer I (Junior level) role, you must have

 A Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field. A minimum of 2 years of experience in electrical engineering, preferably in the construction industry. Proficiency in AutoCAD (and Revit a plus). Experience in designing and implementing power distribution, fire alarm, and low voltage systems a plus. Strong problem-solving skills, with the ability to troubleshoot and resolve electrical issues efficiently. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to explain complex electrical concepts in simple terms. A keen eye for detail, ensuring all designs and systems are accurate and meet project specifications. A strong commitment to safety, ensuring all work is carried out according to safety regulations and standards. The ability to work effectively in a team, contributing to a positive and collaborative work environment.

Join our team and take the next step in your electrical engineering career. Apply today!

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Easy Apply" button.

Want to learn more about this role and Jobot?

Click our Jobot logo and follow our LinkedIn page!

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
